title: I would like to know what properties existed at my condo  prior to it being Osprey Landing off West Lake Shore drive,I know that before it was Osprey Landing it was called  SummerHill ,I have been told prior to that it was a horse race track, but I dont know which one and prior to that it was a farm.I want to know for sure.I found some gemstones on the property and I am curious if they were left there on prpose or lost over time.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4102
